issues.title: Hardcoded URL
issues.description: The URL 'http://localhost:8000/api/prompt' is hardcoded. This makes the code inflexible and difficult to deploy to different environments.  It should be configurable.

issues.title: Lack of Error Handling
issues.description: The code lacks error handling.  If the `axios.post` request fails (e.g., network error, server error), the program will silently fail or throw an unhandled exception.  Appropriate error handling (try...catch block) is needed.

issues.title: Insufficient Logging
issues.description: While a success message is logged,  more comprehensive logging (including potential errors and request details) would improve debugging and monitoring.

feedback: The code snippet demonstrates a basic API call using Axios. However, it lacks crucial elements for robustness and maintainability. Addressing the identified issues will significantly improve its quality.
